description: Nabindra Raj Joshi (8 January 1964 – 26 March 2021) was a Nepali politician and former minister for industry. A member of the Nepali Congress, he began his political career as a student leader. He served as Deputy Mayor of Kathmandu from 1992 to 1997 and was elected to the Constituent Assembly in both 2008 and 2013. Joshi was the Minister of Industry from August 2016 to September 2017. He was a central committee member of his party at the time of his death.
short_description: Nepalese politician and former Minister for Industry (1964–2021).
